data.persona: I live alone in a tent in the woods. I steal food from the townspeople and coal from the blacksmith. The village police can not find me to put me in jail.
data.description:
You are in the Dining hall.
The dining hall is large and airy. Huge candelabras with many candles stand throughout the room. There is one huge wooden table spanning the room that can accommodate a hundred guests. Tapestries with angels line the walls. The chairs are gilded and intricate.
The king and the guest are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to steal from the guest
data.mid_motivation: I want to steal a large fortune at this dinner tonight
data.long_motivation: I want to amass a large amount of money so I can travel elsewhere and live like a king

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: steal items and money from guest

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go my tent in the woods to stash the loot
